name: mls-elo
description: Calculate ELO rankings for Major League Soccer

scripts.etl-no-network: node ./index.js create --verbose && node ./index.js import --verbose && node ./index.js rank --verbose
scripts.etl: node ./index.js create && node ./index.js data && node ./index.js import && node ./index.js rank

author: Doug Wade <douglas.b.wade@gmail.com>
